account_id.description: The unique identifier of the Facebook advertising account associated with the image data.

id.description: The unique identifier of the image data.

name.description: The name or label assigned to the image.

creatives.description: Additional information or metadata related to the image.

original_height.description: The original height dimension of the image in pixels.

original_width.description: The original width dimension of the image in pixels.

permalink_url.description: The permanent URL where the image can be accessed or viewed.

status.description: The current status or state of the image data.

url.description: The URL pointing to the image file.

created_time.description: The date and time when the image was initially created.

hash.description: A unique hash value generated for the image.

url_128.description: The URL pointing to a lower resolution (128px) version of the image file.

is_associated_creatives_in_adgroups.description: Indicates if the image is associated with creatives in ad groups.

filename.description: The name of the file containing the image data.

updated_time.description: The date and time when the image data was last updated.

height.description: The height dimension of the image in pixels.

width.description: The width dimension of the image in pixels.
